item.title: 1,600 flights canceled for weekend as another winter storm takes aim at East Coast
item.description: For the second straight week, millions of Americans will have to contend with a major winter storm â€” and mass travel woes at airports.

item.title: TSA PreCheck Touchless ID: Every airport with the speedy, new security lanes
item.description: Here's a full list of every airline and airport that offers the fast, new TSA PreCheck Touchless ID security program.

item.title: Citi to officially become exclusive issuer of AAdvantage cards in late April
item.description: On April 24, Citi will begin transitioning Barclays AAdvantage cardholders to its AAdvantage products. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: San Francisco gets a new nonstop flight to Central America beginning June 1
item.description: Avianca will begin new seasonal summer service between California's Bay Area and Guatemala City.

item.title: Bilt cardholders: You now have until Feb. 1 to select your Bilt 2.0 product
item.description: Feb. 1 is the last day to seamlessly transition from your old Bilt Mastercard to a new one from the Bilt 2.0 portfolio.
